shrimp.name: DiffuseFalloff
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Lambertian diffuse fall-off model, with control over the falloff between the lit and unlit regions on the surface via the "falloff" variable - this value should be in the [0,1] range. The diffuse color value is passed to "aov_surfacecolor", and the diffuse value to the "aov_diffuse" AOV presets. The "category" variable defines the light categories used for the "illuminance" construct of this block.
